attributes.action: start getting the mental health care in  hospitals and care in the community sorted out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is sad to see that mental health services are getting smaller and smaller the people with mental health problems are not getting the help they need.I have been round mental health as a client and as a servivor and campainer for over 20 years and it is sad to say that if you are on drugs or a drunk you get better services than some body who has mental health problems  as it is not the flavor of the month for most people.  you have closed down the large mental health hospitals and put small ones there they are 80% full of drug and  drunks and 15% of mental health people what a sad way to go. what to do  make it that only people with mental health problems and  do not say or let the drug and drunks use our services as there is not enough for the mentally ill they closed down the drug and drunks services  so open them up again and leave our services to us!
